mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(boardTitle, boardContent, boardRegdate, boardHit, boardLike, boardGroup, boardSequence, boardIsReply, boardUserId) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, now(), 0, 0, #{maxGroup}, 0, false, #{boardUserId})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where boardId > 0 order by boardGroup desc, boardSequence
mapper.update: update tbl_board set boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, boardContent = #{boardContent}, boardUpdatedate = now() where boardId = #{boardId}
